Ram Academy Announcement (our 2020 Online Offering):

Students choosing the RAM ACADEMY will be using Schools PLP (K-8) or PEAK (9-12), These are online curriculums and virtual platforms designed by an outside company that specializes in remote learning. This option is different from what students experienced during our remote learning last spring. Please keep the following in mind when considering this option:

It was actually Deb's mailbox. You can place them in there and we will take care of getting them and getting it in the memory box.

Please keep her family (her husband Patrick, kids Heather and PJ and extended family) as well as our RAM family in your thoughts.

There are two kinds of open enrollment in our district:

INTRA-district open enrollment is for families with K-5 students who live WITHIN the Upper Sandusky School district and wish to have their K-5 child attend a different building than the one they are assigned based on address.

INTER-district open enrollment is for families with students of any grade level who do NOT live within the Upper Sandusky school district borders but wish to attend Upper Sandusky schools.

Open enrollment must be applied for each year.

If you are wanting to apply for open enrollment for the FIRST time ever, please call the central office at 419-294-2306 and leave a message with your name, address, which type of form you need and how many (1 per school-age child). The form(s) will be mailed to you.
